010package imagingbook.common.util;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.Iterator;
014
015/**
016 * This class defines static methods for creating array iterators.
017 */
018public abstract class ArrayIterator {
019        
020        private ArrayIterator() {}
021        
022        // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10335662/convert-java-array-to-iterable.
023        /**
024         * Returns an iterator for the specified (non-primitive) array.
025         * The resulting iterator does not implement {@link Iterator#remove()}.
026         * 
027         * @param <T> the generic element type
028         * @param array a non-primitive array 
029         * @return the associated iterator
030         */
031        public static <T> Iterator<T> from(T[] array) {
032                return Arrays.stream(array).iterator();
033        }
034
035}
